===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Xiamen]], a [[fortification]] which [[formerly]] [[protect]]ed [[Xiamen]] [[bay|Bay]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Xiamen]] [[island|Island]] (廈門[[島]]) in [[Xiamen]] [[bay|Bay]], [[Fujian]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Xiamen]] [[bay|Bay]] (廈門[[灣]]) in [[southeastern]] [[Fujian]] at the [[mouth]]s of the [[Jiulong]] and [[Xixi]] [[river]]s on the [[Taiwan Strait]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Xiamen]] (廈門[[市]]), the [[sub-provincial]] [[city]] of [[Fujian]] on [[Xiamen]] [[island|Island]] and the [[surround]]ing [[Chinese]] [[mainland]], [[now]] [[including]] its [[mountainous]] [[rural]] [[hinterland]] and [[notionally]] [[including]] the [[nearby]] [[Jinmen]] [[island|Islands]] [[still]] [[controlled]] by the [[Republic of China]] on [[Taiwan]].
